Kind regards,

Trudy.

Hi Brittany and Trudy, 

As promised we have created the below thank you pages:
  • Accommodation Waitlist: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-accommodation-waitlist
  • Feedback & Enquiry: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-feedback-enquiry
  • Inpatient Referral: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-inpatient-referral
  • Newsletter: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-newsletter
  • Referral: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-referral
  • Volunteer Form: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-volunteer
  • Disability Accommodation Enquiry: https://royalrehab.com.au/disability-supports-and-accommodation/ty-disability-services/

Please let us know if you require any other updates for this task.

@heath done creating the other thank pages below, please check
  • Feedback & Enquiry: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-feedback-enquiry
  • Inpatient Referral: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-inpatient-referral
  • Newsletter: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-newsletter
  • Referral: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-referral
  • Volunteer Form: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-volunteer

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body: @glen thanks for this, I have made some tweaks. @rica can you please create the other thank you page by duplicating this one and matching the URLs below? Thanks

hi @heath please check the page, https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-accommodation-waitlist/
thanks
got this, will work on it
@glen Please create the first thank you page that will be reviewed by Heath before creating the others.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body: Thanks Heath! 😄

Hi Trudy, 

Sure, no problems. We will action this and it will be completed by tomorrow COB at the latest. 

Brittany, they URLs will be as follows:

  • Accommodation Wait List: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-accommodation-waitlist
  • Feedback & Enquiry: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-feedback-enquiry
  • Inpatient Referral: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-inpatient-referral
  • Newsletter: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-newsletter
  • Referral: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-referral
  • Volunteer Form: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-volunteer
I will confirm once this are ready.

Hi Team,

Can we please create a thank you page for each of the 6 Gravity Forms submissions here:
https://royalrehab.com.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=gf_edit_forms

The individual pages will have the same copy as below, but they must have a unique URL for tracking purposes. So please create an initial page and then copy it 5 more times, updating the URL of each.

The URLs can be:
Accommodation Wait List: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-accommodation-waitlist
Feedback & Enquiry: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-feedback-enquiry
Inpatient Referral: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-inpatient-referral
Newsletter: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-newsletter
Referral: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-referral
Volunteer Form: https://royalrehab.com.au/contact-us/ty-volunteer

Please create the first thank you page for me to review before creating the others.

Thanks!!

Hi Heath,

Could we go with:

“Thanks very much for your enquiry! One of our friendly staff will contact you soon’’.

Kind regards,

Trudy.

Hey Trudy,

It will contribute to the overall conversions for both your SEO & Google Ads.

With the thank you page we will be able to add this as a trackable conversion measurement into your Google Analytics and report on it for your SEO & Google Ads.

For example we have seen that your SEO has produced x number of contact form submissions over x time period.

Thanks
Brittany

Hey Trudy,

Click Dimensions have confirmed there is no integration that will affect our conversion tracking.

I would then suggest we look at implementing a page redirection so that when a user submits a contact form they are redirected to another page which can only be reached once the form has been filled in.

We were unable to implement this previously as the way the website had been set up.

I have trialed your contact form on your contact page and a thank you message appears underneath the contact form.

Thanks
Brittany

Subject: Contact Form Conversion Tracking


Hey Trudy,

In order to track contact form submissions we usually set up a page redirection so that when a user submits a contact form they are redirected to another page which can only be reached once the form has been filled in.

We were unable to implement this previously as the way the website had been set up.

I have trialed your contact form on your contact page and a thank you message appears underneath the contact form.

Currently are you contact forms set up to integrate with any 3rd party platforms or mailing lists?

Thanks
Brittany
